item.title: NEW BACCARA - FANTASY BOY
item.description:
you are just
my fantasy boy
I made you up
you were my toy
and I found you
as a dream
inside my head
your eyes are like
a mystic dream
the deepest blue
I’ve ever seen
you’re a mixture
of paul newman
and your feel
tell me why
tell me why
you’re so real
when I’m dreaming
don’t you know I have
to face reality oh–
fantasy boy
please be my lover
not my toy
cause I need you
to be real
to be no fantasy
I want to touch and
feel my fantasy boy
come on and step
into my life
it’s so much harder
to survive
without your
love for me
come take me to
eternity-

I know
someday
we’re gonna meet
fantasy boy
I feel your heat
want to squeeze you
tease you hold you
in my arms
tell me why
tell me why
you’re so real
when I’m dreaming
don’t you know I have
to face reality oh–
fantasy boy
please be my lover
not my toy
cause I need you
to be real
to be no fantasy
I want to touch and
feel my fantasy boy
come on and step
into my life
it’s so much harder
to survive
without your
love for me
come take me to
eternity

fantasy boy-
